title: Lf Friends
body: Lf friends, any rank, any level, just want people to talk to and play with, whether that be norms or ranked :) add me IGN: æææææææææææææ

replies.body:
Hey there æææææææææææææ!

I represent a large discord based gaming community, noticed your post and I believe we have what you're looking for! Discord link below, join anytime.

Ill be your friend ^.^

ign : purplerain14
